attributes.action: Build a memorial to the citizens who lost their lives during the Covid pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: At the time of writing this nearly 30,000 people have tragically lost their lives to COVID.  That's 30,000 families who have lost a loved one in the most tragic circumstances, unable to be with them when they died, to say goodbye or to even hold their hand.  Many of these other names were NHS medical staff who sacrificed their lives so that others may live.  As a Nation we are duty bound to remember them and honor their memory.
attributes.background: Commision the design and building of a memorial to those who tragically lost their lives to Covid.  These memorials should carry the name of person who died along with their age.  Do not let them fade into history and become a mere statistic.  Each name carries a family grieving for their loss.
